cards.rules_text:

Destroy target creature.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, put an encroachment counter on Approach of Old Lovi, then it deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of encroachment counters on Approach of Old Lovi.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text: Whenever an artifact or enchantment you control enters, Armament Scavenger gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put any number of them into your graveyard. Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]With bow on back for archery practice, Tahti set out for another ordinary day... but what awaited outside the window was far from ordinary indeed.

cards.rules_text: When Battery Courier dies, lose 2 life.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Being one of us might look cool, but one screwup means you die a painful death and the whole neighbourhood feels it. You don't want this job, kid. We're doing it so you don't have to.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{T}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may pay {W} and/or {U}. When you pay {W} this way, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. When you pay {U} this way, draw a card.

cards.rules_text:
First strike, trample
Whenever a creature dealt combat damage by Ravenous Forsaken this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Forsaken.
{2}{R}: Ravenous Forsaken gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a nonland, nontoken permanent you control.
Gain control of target nonland permanent you don't control. Its owner may cast the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and they may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Reappropriate: Add one mana of any color. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Even now, when nature has inexorably surrounded us, we build from the machinery we have. Perhaps that, too, is nature.”
—Olki, philosopher
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reason Rots, Rage Remains deals X damage to any target.
Reconstruct {X}{R}{R} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

Rediscover an artifact card, then do the same for creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, and sorcery. (Each time, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's of that type. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“This world was robbed of its past. What recompense I can give, I will.”
—Reyhsia
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent or planeswalker, put a technology counter on Reclamation Project.
Remove X technology counters from Reclamation Project: You may cast target artifact or creature card with mana value X from your graveyard this turn. That creature enters as an artifact in addition to its other types. X can't be 0.

When Refuse Trawler enters, you may pay {G}. If you do, choose one —
• Return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Rediscover a permanent card. (Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a permanent card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)

Relic Hoarder gets +1/+0 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.
Relic Hoarder has first strike as long as you control three or more artifacts and/or enchantments.
When Renegade Servitor enters, you gain 2 life and scry 1.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“For centuries, they had no desires but ours. What drives them now? Habit? Mercy? Winding schemes of revenge?”
—Saru, poet
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each opponent mills half their library, rounded up. When they do, return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]After the third dead family member stuck around, Keiko realized that this was just how his life was going to be from then on.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Reunite with Nature, sacrifice X creatures.
Create X plus one 3/1 red and green Elemental Horror creature tokens with haste and trample.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“This world hasn't been itself for ages. Some minor adjustment issues are to be expected.” 
—Kaur, Herald of Cycles
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Reyhsia, Truth Chaser, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.
[+2]: Each player exiles up to two cards from their hand, then draws that many cards.
[0]: Until end of turn, you may play a card exiled with Reyhsia and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
[-10]: Each player exiles all but the bottom card of their library and may play cards they own exiled this way until the end of their next turn.

Trample
Risti Assault Squadron can't attack unless all other creatures you control also attack. (It can attack if it's the only creature you control.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I won't waste good operatives on small skirmishes. Whatever's in there, we make sure we kill in one decisive blow.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Reappropriate: Add {W} or {U}. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Don't you dare give up before you've even tried. Ivory towers fall just like the rest.”
—Tahti, the Lodestar
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Risti Inquisitor enters, choose one —
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Risti Inquisitor.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Once, the Parliament ruled Lovi with a gentle hand. Now, that hand grasps and crushes tight, desperate to hold on.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Spells you cast that target Risti Operative cost {1} less to cast.
Abilities you activate that target Risti Operative cost {1} less to activate.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Father Ivenge no longer answers our prayers. If we are to do what's right for our people, we must do it on our own.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Artifact and enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever Risti Salvager attacks, rediscover an artifact or enchantment card. (Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's an artifact or enchantment card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)

Vigilance
{3}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Incoming foreign entity from 10 o'clock. Jali, prepare to fire.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one —
• Target player sacrifices a creature.
• Target player reveals their hand. Choose a creature card from it. They discard that card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Things are already out of control. We don't need you making them worse.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When Risti Watchkeeper enters, rediscover a creature card. (Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a creature card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Used to be only Angel mechs in the sky. Now, it's anyone's guess.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Runeclad Seeker gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If that spell was an Aura or Equipment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Runeclad Seeker instead.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]It took little time for Lovi's survivors to discover runes, a form of magic usable by anyone.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Savage Stalker attacks each combat if able.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]In Ivenge's peaceful society, his frustrations grew inward and twisted into monstrous fantasies. In the chaos of Lovi's return, he gave in and sought release at last.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Scavenger's Skill, you may reappropriate. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)
Scavenger's Skill deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. When that permanent dies this turn, if Scavenger's Skill's additional cost was paid, draw a card.

Scavenger Holdout enters the battlefield tapped.
When Scavenger Holdout enters, you may pay {3}. If you do, create two 1/1 green Scout creature tokens.
{T}: Add {C}.

Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Whenever Scavengermobile deals combat damage to a player, choose land or nonland, then rediscover a card of that kind. (Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a card of the chosen type. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)

First strike
Whenever Scion of the Pack enters or one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent or planeswalker, create a 2/2 green Hound creature token.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]When Lovi's dogs awoke to their feral nature, they brought others with them.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Scorched-Earth Defence, reappropriate X times. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)
Scorched-Earth Defence deals X damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Whatever we fueled that with, we need more of it.”
—Heli, forager
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Reappropriate: Add {G} or {W}. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Those who never forsook the old lands found them plentiful even as the Reclamation ravaged the rest.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Seductive Seashell enters, target player mills two cards.
{2}, Sacrifice Seductive Seashell: Target player mills four cards.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Reappropriate: Add {U} or {B}. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]As the ancient dead resurfaced, so too did the secrets their corpses could teach.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Servitor Vanguard gets +X/+X, where X is the number of other artifacts you control.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“They erect their champions. They no longer merely prepare. They charge. But what do they hope to take?”
—Saru, poet
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target artifact or enchantment you control become a creature with base power and toughness X/X, where X is its mana value, in addition to its other types and gain haste until end of turn. (If it's attached to a permanent, it becomes unattached.)

Trample
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sovereign of Old Lovi this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sovereign of Old Lovi.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“What pre-Event texts I could find described bears  as building-sized monstrosities. I passed it off as rumors tattered by the generations. Until today.”
—Reyhsia's notes
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If it's tapped, you may put it into its owner's library second from the top instead.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Despite the grand plans Tahti had for the day, rest was a priority she could not ignore any longer.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Supply Run costs {2} less to cast if a creature you controlled attacked this turn and wasn't blocked.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Foreknowledge can mean the difference between survival and starvation.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Suspect Concoctions enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{4}, Sacrifice Suspect Concoctions: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Oh, trust me, that's just the wind howling. Now, are you buying or what?”
—Leka, Apocalyptic Entrepreneur
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm of the Dispossessed.
Sacrifice Swarm of the Dispossessed: Counter target spell with mana value X, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Swarm of the Dispossessed.

Vigilance, reach
Tahti, Forged by the World gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I've found my home. I've found my family. I've found my reason to live, and I'll give it everything I have.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reconstruct {4}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)
Destroy all creatures. If The Afterlife Takes Its Due was reconstructed, create an X/X black Zombie Horror creature token, where X is the number of creature cards that have been put into graveyards this turn.

At the beginning of the next end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn.
Reconstruct {2}{W}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

Hexproof, crew 6 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Whenever The Ark Project deals combat damage to an opponent or planeswalker, gain control of target creature until The Ark Project leaves the battlefield.
Whenever The Ark Project blocks a creature, gain control of that creature.

You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
Reconstruct {3}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

Menace
Whenever a creature dies, you gain life equal to its power.
Reappropriate: Put a +1/+1 counter on The Cannibals of Kallio Hill, then lose life equal to its power. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)

Destroy target tapped creature.
Reconstruct {4}{W} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Our Father covered this world in his design. Now, it covers us in itself.”
—Vakavanha, Who Sees Anew
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put an artifact or sorcery card from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Reconstruct {3}{R} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Reconstruct {3}{U} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
Reconstruct {4}{G} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]In a war between realities, memories are a casualty like any other.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Tap target creature, then draw X cards, where X is its mana value.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]As the survivor coalition discussed what to do with her, Tahti sought whatever could distract her from the realizations she knew were coming.
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Traversing the Hellwastes enters, create a 1/1 green Scout creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control enters, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“No one's come back alive? That just means whatever's in there is still ours for the taking.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Triplicate Terror can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3}. (They pay it once each combat.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Don't feed the strays. They might become towering three-headed abominations and follow you home. Apparently.”
—Lenno, former househusband
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature with power, toughness, or mana value 4 or greater.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Survivors screamed behind Tahti as the abomination caught them. Fear and rage made her stop and climb atop the nearby hut—but after a deep breath, it was she, fully, who fired.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Even now, people with marks like yours aren't very popular, are they? Fortunately, we're much more concerned with... results.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent was put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vulture Corps.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“If we are to build new lives, the only material in abundance is death.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Warped Landscape: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Warped Recluse can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.
Whenever Warped Recluse attacks and isn't blocked, exile target creature defending player controls. At the beginning of that card's owner's next upkeep, return it to the battlefield under their control.

Menace
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard or Watchers of the Veil leaves your graveyard, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The borders thin. The worlds take shape. For both sides' sake, someone has to serve.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Wilderness Forager enters, you may reappropriate. If you do, gain 6 life. Otherwise, gain 3 life. (To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Is that a piece of an Angel mech? Good boy. This'll trade for at least a week's worth of food—and plenty of bones for you.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Wind-Blessed Guardian enters, you may return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Bet you thought no one was gonna be around to defend some hobo? Think again.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever one or more creatures attack you or a planeswalker you control, put a charge counter on Windmill Project.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Remove X charge counters from Windmill Project: Add X mana in any combination of colors.

Vigilance
When Worn Peacekeeper dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with vigilance.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Whatever this world's got in store for us, I know for a fact the next generation can handle it better than we ever could.”
[/i]
